member.name: M:log_analyzer_api.Controllers.LogFileUploadController.PostLogFile(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile)
member.summary: Uploads a given log file to log analyzer.

member.summary: Gets all the logs specified withing the given date range.

member.name: M:log_analyzer_api.Controllers.LogInfoController.SearchLogs(System.String)
member.summary: Searches the given term in all the logs.
